item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, February 15, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. JD Vance hits out at Europe’s ‘threat from within’
2. Europe must respond to Trump ‘electroshock’, says Macron
3. [Opinion] Trump has put the ball back in Putin’s court on Ukraine
4. [Opinion] Forget the US — Europe has successfully put tariffs on itself
5. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway slashes stakes in Bank of America and Citi
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, February 15, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
